title: Field-sensitive addressing and control of field-insensitive neutral-atom qubits
title_cn: 场不敏感的中性原子量子位的场敏感寻址和控制
abstract: The establishment of a scalable scheme for quantum computing with addressable and long-lived qubits would provide a route to harnessing the laws of quantum physics to solve classically intractable problems. The design of many proposed platforms for quantum computing is driven by competing needs: isolating the quantum system from the environment to prevent decoherence, and easily and accurately controlling the system with external fields. For example, neutral-atom optical-lattice architectures provide environmental isolation through the use of states that are robust against fluctuating external fields, yet external fields are essential for qubit addressing. Here, we demonstrate the selection of individual qubits with external fields, while the qubits are in field-insensitive superpositions. We use a spatially inhomogeneous external field to map selected qubits to a different field-insensitive superposition, minimally perturbing unselected qubits, despite the fact that the addressing field is not spatially localized. We show robust single-qubit rotations on neutral-atom qubits located at selected lattice sites. This precise coherent control should be more generally applicable to state transfer and qubit isolation in other architectures using field-insensitive qubits.
abstract_cn: 建立具有可寻址且寿命长的量子位的量子计算可扩展方案，将为利用量子物理学定律解决经典的棘手问题提供一条途径。竞争需求推动着许多拟议的量子计算平台的设计：将量子系统与环境隔离以防止退相干，并通过外部场域轻松，准确地控制系统。例如，中性原子光学晶格体系结构通过使用对波动的外部场具有鲁棒性的状态来提供环境隔离，但是外部场对于量子位寻址是必不可少的。在这里，我们展示了具有外部场的单个量子位的选择，而量子位是对场不敏感的叠加。我们使用空间上不均匀的外部场将选定的量子位映射到不同的对场不敏感的叠加，从而最小化未选择的量子位，尽管寻址场未在空间上定位。我们显示了位于选定晶格位点的中性原子量子位的鲁棒单量子位旋转。这种精确的相干控制应该更普遍地适用于使用场不敏感量子位的其他体系结构中的状态转移和量子位隔离。

title: Observation of electric-field-induced Cs Rydberg atom macrodimers
title_cn: 电场诱导的Cs Rydberg原子大二聚体的观察
abstract: We report the observation of cold Cs Rydberg-atom molecules bound at internuclear separations of R∼3–9 μm. The bound states result from avoided crossings between Rydberg-atom-pair interaction potentials in an applied electric field. The molecular states can be modified by changing the applied electric field. The molecules are observed by mapping the radial separation of the two Rydberg atoms as a function of time delay between excitation and detection using the Coulomb repulsion of the ions after pulsed field ionization. Measurements were performed for 63D+65D, 64D+66D, 65D+67D and 66D+68D pairs. The experiment is in good agreement with calculations of the pair interactions for these states.
abstract_cn: 我们报告了在R＆＃8764; 3＆＃8211; 9＆＃8201;＆＃956; m的核间分离处结合的冷Cs Rydberg原子分子的观察结果。 束缚态是由外加电场中避免的Rydberg-原子对相互作用电位之间的交叉产生的。 可以通过改变施加的电场来改变分子状态。 通过在脉冲场电离后使用离子的库仑排斥，通过映射两个Rydberg原子的径向间距作为激发和检测之间的时间延迟的函数来观察分子。 对63D + 65D，64D + 66D，65D + 67D和66D + 68D对进行了测量。 实验与这些状态对的相互作用计算非常吻合。

title: Observation of an Efimov spectrum in an atomic system
title_cn: 观察原子系统中的Efimov光谱
abstract: In 1970, Vitaly Efimov predicted that three quantum particles subjected to a resonant pair-wise interaction can join into an infinite number of loosely bound states, even if each pair of particles cannot bind. The properties of these aggregates, such as the peculiar geometric scaling of their energy spectrum, are universal, that is, independent of the microscopic details of their components. Despite an extensive search in many different physical systems, including atoms, molecules and nuclei, the characteristic spectrum of Efimov trimer states has not been observed so far. Here, we report on the discovery of two bound trimer states of potassium atoms very close to the Efimov scenario, which we reveal by studying three-particle collisions in an ultracold gas. Our observation provides the first evidence of an Efimov spectrum and enables a direct test of its scaling behaviour, providing potentially general insights into the physics of few-body systems.
abstract_cn: 在1970年，维塔利·埃菲莫夫（Vitaly Efimov）预测，即使每对粒子不能结合，经受共振的成对相互作用的三个量子粒子也可以加入无限数量的松散结合状态。 这些聚集体的特性（例如其能谱的特殊几何比例缩放）是通用的，也就是说，与它们的成分的微观细节无关。 尽管在包括原子，分子和原子核在内的许多不同物理系统中进行了广泛的搜索，但迄今为止尚未观察到Efimov三聚体态的特征谱。 在这里，我们报告了非常接近Efimov情景的两个绑定的钾原子三聚态的发现，这是通过研究超冷气体中的三粒子碰撞揭示的。 我们的观察结果提供了Efimov谱的第一个证据，并可以直接测试其缩放行为，从而提供了对小体系统物理学的潜在普遍认识。

title: Coherent manipulation of Bose–Einstein condensates with state-dependent microwave potentials on an atom chip
title_cn: 原子芯片上状态依赖的微波势对玻色-爱因斯坦凝聚物的相干处理
abstract: Entanglement-based technologies, such as quantum information processing, quantum simulations and quantum-enhanced metrology, have the potential to revolutionize our way of computing and measuring, and help clarify the puzzling concept of entanglement itself. Ultracold atoms on atom chips are attractive for their implementation, as they provide control over quantum systems in compact, robust and scalable set-ups. An important tool in this system is a potential depending on the internal atomic state. Coherent dynamics in such a potential combined with collisional interactions enables entanglement generation both for individual atoms and ensembles. Here, we demonstrate coherent manipulation of Bose-condensed atoms in a state-dependent potential, generated with microwave near-fields on an atom chip. We reversibly entangle atomic internal and motional states, realizing a trapped-atom interferometer with internal-state labelling. Our system provides control over collisions in mesoscopic condensates, paving the way to on-chip generation of many-particle entanglement and quantum-enhanced metrology with spin-squeezed states.
abstract_cn: 基于纠缠的技术，例如量子信息处理，量子模拟和量子增强的计量学，有可能改变我们的计算和测量方式，并有助于阐明纠缠本身的令人困惑的概念。原子芯片上的超冷原子对于其实现具有吸引力，因为它们以紧凑，可靠且可扩展的设置提供对量子系统的控制。该系统中的重要工具是取决于内部原子状态的电势。在这样的电势中，相干动力学与碰撞相互作用相结合，使得单个原子和整体都能产生纠缠。在这里，我们演示了在原子依赖状态下由原子芯片上的微波近场产生的玻色凝聚原子的相干操纵。我们可逆地纠缠原子的内部状态和运动状态，从而实现了带有内部状态标记的原子捕获干涉仪。我们的系统可控制介观凝析物中的碰撞，为片上生成多粒子纠缠和具有自旋压缩态的量子增强计量学奠定了基础。

title: Role of shear modulus and statistics in the supersolidity of helium
title_cn: 剪切模量和统计量在氦超固结中的作用
abstract: The first clear evidence for supersolidity in helium came from experiments in which the resonant period of a torsional oscillator decreased below ∼0.2 K, indicating that some of the solid 4He decoupled from the oscillation. More recently, shear-modulus measurements on solid 4He revealed an unexpected increase with the same dependence on temperature and 3He impurities. The similarities raised the possibility that the period drop in torsion experiments is simply due to the stiffening of the solid. Here, we report the same measurements on solid 3He, a Fermi solid instead of a Bose solid. The anomalous modulus increase found in hexagonal close-packed (hcp) 4He, is also found in hcp 3He. However, in the case of 3He, the shear modulus increase is not accompanied by a corresponding period change of the torsional oscillator. We conclude that elastic stiffening alone does not produce the changes in the torsional-oscillator period and that decoupling occurs only in a stiffened Bose solid.
abstract_cn: 氦气超固相的第一个明确证据来自实验，其中扭转振荡器的共振周期降低到＆＃8764; 0.2＆＃8201; K以下，表明某些固体 4 他摆脱了振荡。最近，对固体 4 He的剪切模量测量显示出意外增加，并且对温度和 3 He杂质的依赖性相同。相似之处提出了扭转实验中的周期下降仅仅是由于固体变硬的可能性。在这里，我们报告了对固体 3 He（费米固体而不是玻色固体）进行的相同测量。在六方密堆积（hcp） 4 He中发现异常模量增加，在hcp 3 He中也发现异常模量增加。但是，在 3 He的情况下，剪切模量的增加并不伴随着扭转振荡器的相应周期变化。我们得出的结论是，单独的弹性加劲不会在扭转振动周期内产生变化，并且去耦仅发生在加劲的Bose实体中。

title: Lévy flights of photons in hot atomic vapours
title_cn: 热原子蒸气中光子的勒维飞行
abstract: The properties of random and fluctuating systems are often studied through the use of Gaussian distributions. However, in a number of situations, rare events have drastic consequences, which cannot be explained by Gaussian statistics. Considerable efforts have thus been devoted to the study of non-Gaussian fluctuations such as Lévy statistics, generalizing the standard description of random walks. Unfortunately, only macroscopic signatures, obtained by averaging over many random steps, are usually observed in physical systems. We present experimental results investigating the elementary process of anomalous diffusion of photons in hot atomic vapours. We measure the step-size distribution of the random walk and show that it follows a power-law characteristic of Lévy flights.
abstract_cn: 经常通过使用高斯分布来研究随机系统和波动系统的性质。 但是，在许多情况下，罕见事件会产生严重后果，高斯统计无法解释。 因此，已经投入了大量的努力来研究诸如L＆＃233; vy统计之类的非高斯起伏，概括了随机游走的标准描述。 不幸的是，通常在物理系统中通常只能观察到通过对许多随机步骤求平均值而获得的宏观特征。 我们目前的实验结果调查了热原子蒸气中光子异常扩散的基本过程。 我们测量了随机游走的步长分布，并表明它遵循L＆＃233; vy飞行的幂律特征。

title: Directing cell motions on micropatterned ratchets
title_cn: 指导微模式棘轮上的细胞运动
abstract: Cell motility is a process deriving from the synchronized dynamics of the cytoskeleton. In several important physiological processes—notably, cancer metastasis—the randomly moving cells can acquire a directional motility phenotype and bias their motions in response to environmental cues. Despite intense research, however, the current understanding of directional cell migration is incomplete and there is a growing need to develop systems that would enable the study and control of this process. This article demonstrates that random motions of motile cells can be rectified by asymmetric (‘ratchet’) microgeometries. Interactions between the cells and the imposed geometrical cues guide cell polarization and give rise to directional motility. Depending on the ratchet design, cells of different types can move either in the same or in opposite directions on the same imposed pattern. In the latter case, it is possible to partially sort mixed cell populations into different collecting reservoirs.
abstract_cn: 细胞运动是源自细胞骨架同步动力学的过程。在几个重要的生理过程中，尤其是癌症转移，随机移动的细胞可以获取方向性运动表型，并根据环境提示使它们的运动发生偏向。尽管进行了深入的研究，但是，目前对定向细胞迁移的理解还不完整，并且越来越需要开发能够研究和控制该过程的系统。本文证明，可以通过不对称（棘齿）微几何形状纠正运动细胞的随机运动。细胞与施加的几何提示之间的相互作用引导细胞极化，并引起方向运动。根据棘轮的设计，不同类型的细胞可以在相同的施加模式下沿相同或相反的方向移动。在后一种情况下，可以将混合细胞群体部分分类到不同的收集容器中。</ p>
